CardText.Text: Lightning never strikes the same place twice, but it can strike freaking everywhere!
I feel like I'm gonna break this thing.
Cross their heart, hope they die.
I can do this all day...
A beast of many forms - Fire, Lightning, and Poison
May God have mercy upon my enemies, because I won't.
Ammo is no longer an issue.
Don't drop it... might lose a toe.
I spy with my little eye...
I have you in my eye, sir.
Why don't you go shoot yourself an elephant?
A hunter lives among the stars...
Careful... you might put someone's eye out.
2 more bullets make all the difference
TORGUE! Bastard Guns for Bastard People!
Guns of the Revolution will never fall silent!
You can run, but you can't hide.
Useful for kicking Hector's bitch ass.
I think you have something on your shoe.
For when you want to splat something.
For when you want to splat the living shit out of something.
